refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Use this file to list the destinations for which you want to disable ECN (Explicit Congestion Notification).
The columns in the file are as follows.

listitem.para: Interface through which host(s) communicate with the firewall

Comma-separated list of host and/or network addresses. If left empty or supplied as "-", ::/0 is assumed. If your kernel and ip6tables include iprange match support then IP address ranges are also permitted.
